parameters.name: subscriptionPicker
parameters.label: Subscription
parameters.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
| project subscriptionId, name
| order by name asc

parameters.name: resourceGroupPicker
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups"
| where subscriptionId in~ ({subscriptionPicker})
| project resourceGroup, label = name
| order by label asc

parameters.name: resource
parameters.label: Dedicated databases
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.sql/servers/databases"
|where (kind in~ ('v12.0,user,datawarehouse','v12.0,user,datawarehouse,gen2','v12.0,user,datawarehouse,gen2,analytics')) and ((type =~ ('microsoft.sql/servers/databases')))
|where not((type =~ ('microsoft.sql/servers/databases')) and ((kind in~ ('system','v2.0,system','v12.0,system','v12.0,user,datawarehouse,gen2,analytics'))))
| where resourceGroup in ({resourceGroupPicker})
| extend [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed = iff((tostring(tags) has '"[parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed":"true"'), "yes", "no")
| where [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed in~ ({[parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed})
| project id, name

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.sql/servers/databases"
| where resourceGroup in~ ({resourceGroupPicker})
| where subscriptionId in ({subscriptionPicker})
| where id in~ ({resource})
| extend rgName = split(id, "/", 4)[0]
| extend ['Resource group'] = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', rgName)
| extend Subscription = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
| extend [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed = iff((tostring(tags) has '"[parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed":"true"'), "yes", "no")
| where [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed in~ ({[parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed}) 
| extend ['Server name'] = tostring(split(id, "/", 8)[0])
| extend ['Service tier'] = tostring(properties.requestedServiceObjectiveName)
|where (kind in~ ('v12.0,user,datawarehouse','v12.0,user,datawarehouse,gen2','v12.0,user,datawarehouse,gen2,analytics')) and ((type =~ ('microsoft.sql/servers/databases')))
|where not((type =~ ('microsoft.sql/servers/databases')) and ((kind in~ ('system','v2.0,system','v12.0,system','v12.0,user,datawarehouse,gen2,analytics'))))
|where not((type =~ ('microsoft.sql/servers')) and ((kind =~ ('v12.0,analytics'))))
| extend ['Generation'] = tostring(split(kind,",",3)[0])
| project ['Resource'] = id, ['Name'] = name, ['Server name'], ['Service tier'], ['Generation'], ['Location'] = location, [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed, ['Resource group'], Subscription
| order by ['Resource group']
content.title: Dedicated SQL Databases
content.noDataMessage: No resources deployed for chosen environment

content.json: #### No Dedicated SQL Pools (formerly SQL DW) deployed in this environment yet
